title: Ticket #602: scheduler universe jobs don't count as running jobs
description:
# condor_q | tail -n 1
1100 jobs; 624 idle, 476 running, 0 held
# condor_status -sched

Name                 Machine    TotalRunningJobs TotalIdleJobs TotalHeldJobs

schedd-name           box.lab.                0           624              0

                      TotalRunningJobs      TotalIdleJobs      TotalHeldJobs


               Total                 0                624                  0
remarks:
2010-Aug-23 17:07:50 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070402 to v070404 using ./ticket_target_mover.
2010-Oct-27 16:39:01 by adesmet:
Bulk change of target version from v070404 to v070405 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2013-Jun-04 14:22:20 by tannenba:
This is as intended, at least for now. Info about scheduler universe jobs is in attribute TotalSchedulerJobsRunning. Changing this ticket from defect to doc, updating the manual, and resolving.
check_ins: 2013-Jun-04 14:26   Check-in [35987]: Clarify docs about Total[Running|Idle]Jobs schedd ad attributes. #602 Specifically, point out they do not consider local or scheduler universe jobs. (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: matt
